mapper.select: SELECT OCCRRNC_DE , ADMINIST_ZONE_SE , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE , OPERT_SN , CHANGE_SE_CODE , PROCESS_SE , ADMINIST_ZONE_NM , LOWEST_ADMINIST_ZONE_NM , CTPRVN_CODE , SIGNGU_CODE , EMD_CODE , LI_CODE , CREAT_DE , ABL_DE , ABL_ENNC , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM comtcadministcoderecptnlog WHERE OCCRRNC_DE=#{occrrncDe} AND ADMINIST_ZONE_SE=#{administZoneSe} AND ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE=#{administZoneCode} AND OPERT_SN=#{opertSn}
